about_the_game:
Overview:

The Rake is an open-world survival horror game where you hunt down & kill The Rake. You can use cameras, guns, beartraps, bait, and anything else you can find to defend yourself against The Rake and any other wild animals you come across while exploring and doing quests in the detailed and realistic open world. if you'd like to give me suggestions, feedback, ask me question, or just want keep up with announcements, trailers, and new screenshots join the Discord. There is also a currently an on-going Analog Horror series in-universe that you can find on the Kanoleiro YouTube channel.

Features:

  • Detailed Open-World

  • Detailed Locations filled with Lore & Loot

  • Hour Long Main Quest

  • Day/Night Cycle with Weather

  • Original Soundtrack

  • Wide Variety of Guns & Equipment

  • Deployable Beartraps & Cameras

  • PC Desktop System with Flyable Drone

  • Inventory System with Storage

Lore: 

The main campaign takes place in Hells Valley National Park in Pennsylvania, which has been closed off to the public for years due to dozens of murders and unexplained disappearances. You have been invited by your friend to help him hunt The Rake after years of tracking down its home. You arrive only to find a blood stain, flashlight, and frantically written note. This is where the Main Quest picks up, which revolves around going from location to location searching for your friend while completing mini-objectives and having to defending yourself from The Rake along the way. It's optional so if you want to just explore the map and kill the rake you can do that too.

Analog Horror:

The game also has an analog horror series that takes place fully in-universe. The first season is currently on-going & will give backstory/lore for the first campaign: Hells Valley National Park & future seasons will focus on future maps and campaigns slowly building and expanding the world and universe. You can watch the full series as its coming out on the Kanoleiro YouTube channel with the link in the Steam-page.

name: The Rake

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600X, Intel Core i5-7600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Ti, AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X, Intel Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER, AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: The Rake is an open-world singleplayer horror game where you have to survive and hunt The Rake while exploring the world or completing the main quest. Use Beartraps, Trailcams, Pistols, SMGs, Rifles, Weapon Attachments, Drones, and anything else you find to survive.
